name: Real Taxi 3d Car Parking Simulator
description:
Real Taxi Car Parking Simulator

Taxi Parking Simulation has realistic and challenging parking situations. It has more than levels and good steering system.
Real Taxi Parking Simulator 3D is an addictive game and full of excitement with a unique driving experience and gorgeous 3d graphics.
Player can also rotate the camera to see things better. Enjoy and please don't crash other vehicles!
You have to drive safely, and quickly. This game Taxi car parking has a limit, you're limited to a few tens of seconds. You do not get hit
by any obstacle, because when you hit something, you have to start everything from the beginning.
Don’t get stuck in the traffic on the highways, drive fast and smart.

key features:

HD Graphics
Choice between Touch or accelerometer control
Limited time with the possibility to improve your score
FREE download – and completely free-to-play
